5ec4f776-57b1-45db-8417-3925633f6143.description: Tilting in CLARITY means you are focused on connecting PEOPLE and INFORMATION and have a natural proclivity for interpreting and analyzing data that can ultimately affect people. Patient with doing your homework and investigating the details thoroughly, you like taking time to dive deep and interpret the risk of various paths of action. You may often find yourself playing an advisory role to others.
5ec4f776-57b1-45db-8417-3925633f6143.name: Clarity Tilt - Quiet Genius

cb297698-62a0-43ad-b756-b904c10e6127.description: Tilting in IMPACT means that you are focused on connecting IDEAS and ACTION and have a natural proclivity for inventing new solutions. A catalyst for innovation, you are comfortable with risk and like taking new ideas and putting them into action.

0a352dd7-334b-4bea-980a-200f6583414b.description: This person is certified in the True Tilt Profile, the only self-assessment available to help individuals discover their natural character strengths and take concrete steps to develop their personal agility. The assessment provides deep, personalized insights - not only what we tend to do, but why we do it. Results are reported in a memorable visual framework with actionable suggestions for growth.
0a352dd7-334b-4bea-980a-200f6583414b.name: True Tilt Personality Profile

alignments.name: Continuing Coach Education CCE Qualified
alignments.description: Continuing Coach Education (CCE) is intended for third-party training providers who are interested in having their training program accredited by the International Coach Federation (ICF). CCE is considered supplemental and advanced education for those wishing to acquire new learning and/or those who are renewing their ICF Credential.

badge_template_activities.title: Passed the True Tilt Profile Certification exam

Completed the True Tilt Profile Certification course (live virtual or in-person): 6 to 8 hours of direct instruction & interaction with additional hours of self-paced assignments. Topics include: In-depth study of the True Tilt patterns, what drives us, the potential within everyone to use any Tilt pattern as needed, and an easy, memorable process for developing greater personal and professional agility to accelerate the best version of our selves - especially in stressful situations.

The certificate holder agreed to terms including, but not limited to: Observing all Industry standards of ethics, professionalism, and confidentiality; Using only official Tilt365 logos, assessments, materials, etc.; Using Tilt365-provided resources to remain up-to-date on research and new offerings  between certification dates

Completed a True Tilt Profile self-assessment and analyzed the results implications of self- and sample client assessments. Facilitated personalized internal agility development plans using Tilt365 methodology.

skills.name: Greater Self-awareness And Awareness Of Others
Managing Stress In Self And Others
Understanding Stress Reactions In Self And Others

4da31610-4848-486a-8f23-ecb036a92c7c.description: This person is certified in the Positive Influence Predictor, a multi-rater assessment that collects observer feedback in real time and a variety of contexts. Rather than a "one and done" static assessment, users can collect feedback whenever they want and use it to develop their Character Strength and positive influence and work more effectively with others over a year-long subscription.
4da31610-4848-486a-8f23-ecb036a92c7c.name: Positive Influence Predictor

alignments.name: Continuing Coach Education CCE Qualified
alignments.description: Continuing Coach Education (CCE) is intended for third-party training providers who are interested in having their training program accredited by the International Coach Federation (ICF). CCE is considered supplemental and advanced education for those wishing to acquire new learning and/or those who are renewing their ICF Credential.

badge_template_activities.title: Passed the Positive Influence Predictor Certification exam

Completed the Positive Influence Predictor Certification course (live virtual or in-person immersive): 6 to 8 hours of direct instruction & interaction with additional hours of self-paced assignments. Topics include: What drives most interpersonal conflict, how to interpret feedback, aligning our responses to our intentions, and an easy, sustainable process for developing greater Character Strength to improve personal and professional relationships and effectiveness.

The certificate holder agreed to terms including, but not limited to: Observing all Industry standards of ethics, professionalism, and confidentiality; Using only official Tilt365 logos, assessments, materials, etc.; Using Tilt365-provided resources to remain up-to-date on research and new offerings  between certification dates

Completed a Positive Influence Predictor self-assessment with observer feedback and analyzed the results and implications of self- and sample client assessments. Facilitated interpersonal agility development plans using Tilt365 methodology.

eb1a0494-24de-47ef-b208-8308c7025339.description: This person is certified in the Team Agility Predictor, a 360-degree feedback assessment for teams that measures their behavior patterns so that team leaders and members have the insights they need to perform as a more cohesive unit. This certification also includes the Team Climate Profile, which predicts the team climate that may result from the mix of True Tilt patterns in the team, as well as how team dynamics may shift under stress.
eb1a0494-24de-47ef-b208-8308c7025339.name: Team Agility Predictor

alignments.name: Continuing Coach Education CCE Qualified
alignments.description: Continuing Coach Education (CCE) units are earned upon completing Continuing Coach Education. CCE units are awarded in two categories: Core Competencies: Advanced coach training that directly relates to or expands upon the ICF Core Competencies Resource Development: Training in skills for a coach’s professional development.

badge_template_activities.title: Passed the Team Agility Predictor Certification exam

Completed the Team Agility Predictor Certification course (live virtual or in-person immersive): 6 to 8 hours of direct instruction & interaction with additional hours of self-paced assignments. Topics include: The balance of polarities necessary for ongoing team agility, uncovering the unconscious habits that may be keeping them from reaching their true potential, and customized development plans for accelerating productivity, creativity, and innovation.

Analyzed the results and implications of Team Climate Profile and Team Agility Predictor  results and implications for sample client assessments. Developed plans for increasing team agility and the team climate for productivity, creativity, and innovation using Tilt365 methodology.

skills.name: Apply Agile Method To Team Dynamics
Managing Stress In Self And Others

80b36255-b800-455a-bde7-180bb810a837.description: Agility is a top priority for team leaders and top executives because it enables their organizations to compete effectively in this era of constant digital disruption. Agile teams can adapt to current trends, business needs, and complex dynamics while accelerating productivity, creativity, and innovation. Agile team climates also improve resilience and employee morale, which are key to retaining talent. Graduates can expertly facilitate teams in the path to agility.
80b36255-b800-455a-bde7-180bb810a837.name: Master Agility Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of this course certifies this expert in the use of a suite of assessments based on character science. Personality, influence and team dynamics employ diagnostic assessments to create a dialogue for the development of leading self, leading influence and leading team climate and culture.
Completion of this course advances the practitioner's self-awareness, growth and facilitation experience by being a participant in the three workshops on mastering Agility.

1378bb2c-6635-4434-bf1c-091742ac6167.description: Get certified in the laser coaching method for leaders paired with Tilt365. Level up your coaching skills and help your clients solve their own problems by learning the laser-focused coaching method. Breakthrough results happen when you stay out of the story and coach the person’s mindset and thinking instead of solving the problem for them. Learn the coaching issues and derailers of the four Tilting patterns so you can coach with precision.
1378bb2c-6635-4434-bf1c-091742ac6167.name: Laser Coaching MASTERCLASS

alignments.name: ICF Coaching Credentials
alignments.description: This course qualifies as an ACSTH coaching academy approved by the ICF (International Coach Federation). Learners who graduate can use the course curriculum to apply for their coaching credentials as an ACC or to upgrade to PCC or MCC. The laser coaching skills are uniquely helpful to get higher level credentials.

badge_template_activities.title: Blended learning with 48 hours of LIVE ONLINE practice and mentoring, plus 12 hours of curated concept and skill-teaching curriculum that is delivered through ON DEMAND self-study at your own pace. Plus read the text included with the course.
Mentor Hours are optional and offered to complete the 10-hour requirement for mentor hours associated with an application for an International Coach Federation Credential.

skills.name: How To Identify And Communicate With Different Personality Types

5ed52db8-b0ce-489b-a7c4-4e5eab47cc00.description: The Tilt Coaching model is used to teach coaches and leaders how to relate to the four aspects of wholeness in their clients or direct reports. Methods and techniques for how to support yet challenge our clients to surface the root cause of behaviors at their core. Surfacing defense mechanisms and distorted thinking patterns help clarify the truth about their current reality. Exploring beliefs that can reframe the mindset for new possibilities creates actions for a future state.
5ed52db8-b0ce-489b-a7c4-4e5eab47cc00.name: Coaching Techniques

alignments.name: Coach Continuing Education CCE Qualified
alignments.description: Continuing Coach Education (CCE) is intended for third-party training providers who are interested in having their training program accredited by the International Coach Federation (ICF). CCE is considered supplemental and advanced education for those wishing to acquire new learning and/or those who are renewing their ICF Credential.

badge_template_activities.title: Learned the advanced coaching techniques associated with the Tilt 365 Coaching Model. Includes lowering defense mechanisms, clearing distorted thinking patterns, reframing beliefs and co-creating actions and practices for change.
Practiced coaching all four steps in the Tilt 365 Coaching Model to help clients move from their current state to their future state.

504c295d-1d73-4ea9-b128-fe942180fe11.description: An entire team of personalities lives within the psyche of all of us and they team up to protect and advance our survival in the most interesting ways. Based on Jungian psychology, the Tilt 365 framework is based on the science of character development and helps us learn how to manage our inner "parts" that arise when we encounter stress. Lizard-brain interactions result when our most primitive impulses are triggered. Discover what they are trying to tell us and grow with an agile mindset.
504c295d-1d73-4ea9-b128-fe942180fe11.name: Tiltology: The Agile Personality

alignments.name: ICF Credential Continuing Education
alignments.description: Coach specific training that qualifies for ICF approval must teach the core competencies of the profession. This course qualified for CE credits by the ICF.Coach specific training that qualifies for ICF approval must teach the core competencies of the profession. This course qualified for CE credits by the ICF.

badge_template_activities.title: Take the True Tilt Personality Profile and discover the four sub-personality patterns that make up your Unique Amplifier. Based on positive psychology and character science, this compelling exercise in self-development brings exponential transformation quickly.

Learned the personality framework and system called Tiltology, which reveals the team of personalities that live with all of us. Explored the five mindsets of each of the 12 sub-personalities and how they show up in all levels of mindsets ranging from rigid to agile.

Practice self exploration in pairs to uncover the hidden motives of sub-personalities and teams of sub-personalities to reveal their nature and mode of operation. Discover how fear drives our behaviors in search of approval, status, power and attention and unwittingly create self-fulfilling prophecies that thwart our conscious intentions. Practice surfacing the true nature of these inner "parts" using the persona interview method and uncensored sentence completions.

skills.name: Greater Self-awareness And Awareness Of Others

dd58d9d8-7c21-4358-9935-147b38883e15.description: The most advanced experts in the Tilt framework, assessments and deliver our train-the-trainer to your internal human development teams. dd58d9d8-7c21-4358-9935-147b38883e15.name: Authorized Training Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Trainers with this credential have at least five years of experience in interpretation and analysis of the Tilt 365 Suite of Assessments that grow an agile mindset and develop character strengths in people, teams and culture.
Trainers with this credential have attended and passed all courses available through the Tilt 365 Academy for Laser Coaching. Skills help people and teams with agility, generativity and innovation.
Trainers with this credential bring at least 20 years of business and education/training/facilitation experience prior to learning the Tilt 365 curriculum.

skills.name: Developing And Empowering Your Team Through Feedback And Coaching

8e7d7812-052d-4a6c-a995-dfa1d4b1dd9c.description: The officers and leaders at Tilt, Inc. who research, design and produce assessments that develop the Agile Personality, Team and Culture of the tech age, so they can innovate fast.
8e7d7812-052d-4a6c-a995-dfa1d4b1dd9c.name: Tilt365 Leadership Team

badge_template_activities.title: Researching, designing and building Assessments that work in the technology age and encourage agile innovation.
Educating and supporting high performing teams with assessment, strategy and skill-building through personality development and agility building.

skills.name: Agile And Lean Project Leadership Methodologies

911d7d78-e39d-46a2-96ea-1ba896046637.description: Advisors have been and continue to be an important part of our success and we have benefited over time by tapping into special skillsets that inform our path forward as a tech startup and workshop provider for high performing teams who want to be agile and innovative.
